If you think it breaks a UX principle or guideline, it's a UX bug.

Usability engineering is based on structured methods for achieving efficiency and elegance in interface design.
Usability engineering is based on structured methods for achieving efficiency and elegance in interface design.
Usability is about users, so we basically observe, talk, interview, watch videos, and read comments to get an impression of what our users need.
Usability is about users, so we basically observe, talk, interview, watch videos, and read comments to get an impression of what our users need.
Usability over Graphical Design
Usability over Graphical Design
User experience design (UX) is the process of enhancing user satisfaction by improving the usability, accessibility, and pleasure with LibreOffice products.
User experience design (UX) is the process of enhancing user satisfaction by improving the usability, accessibility, and pleasure with LibreOffice products.
We also take care about accessibility, branding to the visual design including icons, and support the QA, marketing and development teams.
We also take care about accessibility, branding to the visual design including icons, and support the QA, marketing and development teams.
We always have open tasks for creative people with no doing expertise, as well as more advanced topics for experienced usability engineers.

We start new topics with the reference to the bug tracker, followed by the description of current state and how competitors solve the problem, in order to get a common understanding.

With this input we scribble mockups using Balsamiq Mockups, or other tools like LibreOffice Draw or Pencil, and eventually after a couple of iterations and discussions, the proposal is published on our design blog to get input from the community.
